• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes

    HIV.B.DE167Client received treatment and/or counselling as neededIntimate partner violence enquiry results - Client received treatment and/or counselling as needed
    HIV.B.DE168Client was referredIntimate partner violence enquiry results - Client was referred
    HIV.B.DE169No action necessaryIntimate partner violence enquiry results - No action necessary
    HIV.B.DE170Other IPV result (specify)Intimate partner violence enquiry results - Other IPV result (specify)
